scripts.build: browserify browser/webmap.js -o server/public/javascripts/bundle.js & cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css server/public/stylesheets/leaflet.css
scripts.bundle: browserify browser/webmap.js | terser --compress --mangle > server/public/javascripts/bundle.js & cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css server/public/stylesheets/leaflet.css
